data.eml:eml: Zorotypus hukawngi sp. nov., a Fossil Winged Zoraptera (Insect) in Burmese Amber

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Xin-Yu, Su, Gui-Fen (2019): Zorotypus hukawngi sp. nov., a Fossil Winged Zoraptera (Insect) in Burmese Amber. Zootaxa 4571 (2): 263-269, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4571.2.6
